nodes.text: The Canyons of Mist were a series of canyons on the forest moon of the planet Endor. Ewok warriors of Bright Tree Village were once directed to a cave there by the Dulok King Vulgarr, who claimed that a monster lived there who had kidnapped one of their young. However, this was all part of a scheme in which Vulgarr himself planned to kidnap the woklings while the warriors were away; Instead of a monster, the Ewok warriors found another Dulok named Ulgo.
The Canyons of Mist were created by Joe Johnston for his 1984 book The Adventures of Teebo: A Tale of Magic and Suspense.
